source: TEXT_FESNYRSEASHOGUN2014_00147_REDGENERAL_000_000<tab>Heavensturn is a chance anew, yes? I am thinking it is like the game─rock, silk, claw.
target:
TEXT_FESNYRSEASHOGUN2014_00147_REDGENERAL_000_000「降神祭」は節目の祝日。
人々はこの季節を境に心機一転し、新たな志を胸に、
新たな季節の巡りを生きていく……。

source: TEXT_FESNYRSEASHOGUN2014_00147_REDGENERAL_000_001<tab>The hand is coming up, the hand is making shapes, the hand is winning, losing, or tying. Every Heavensturn, the hand is coming up. Chance, <var 08 E905 ((m'lady)) ((m'lord)) /var>, chance.
target:
TEXT_FESNYRSEASHOGUN2014_00147_REDGENERAL_000_001我々もまた、馬の宣伝という新たな一歩を踏み出すのだ。
そのためには、馬鳥……チョコボと決着をつけねばな。

source: TEXT_FESNYRSEASHOGUN2014_00147_REDGENERAL_000_010<tab>You are losing the crimson uma kabuto? Sometimes, I am thinking you are not very smart.
target:
TEXT_FESNYRSEASHOGUN2014_00147_REDGENERAL_000_010拙者が託した「」をなくしたのか？
……まったく、とんだうつけ者だな。

source: TEXT_FESNYRSEASHOGUN2014_00147_REDGENERAL_000_011<tab>Does <var 08 E905 ((m'lady)) ((m'lord)) /var> sniffle? Another one in your hands, I am thinking, will dry those tears.
target:
TEXT_FESNYRSEASHOGUN2014_00147_REDGENERAL_000_011しかし、おぬしの実力は既に知るところ。
予備を贈呈するので、今度こそ大事に扱ってくれ。
